summary: This document appears to be a financial record related to a deposit account with Deutsche Bank, detailing customer identification policies and obligations for account holders. It outlines the bank's requirements for verifying identities and maintaining compliance with anti-money laundering regulations.
keyFacts: The document includes a notice of customer identification policy required by federal law for financial institutions.
It outlines the obligations of clients to provide accurate information and notify the bank of any changes.
The document emphasizes the bank's role in combating money laundering and terrorist financing.
